    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_289</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_289</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ecuaciones y sistemas exponenciales y logarítmicos</string>
            <string language="en">Exponential equations and logarithms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponentiale Gleichungen und Logarithmen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équations et logarithmes exponentiels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equações e logarítmos exponenciais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazioni e logaritmi esponenziali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκθετικοί εξισώσεις και λογάριθμοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de ecuaciones y sistemas de ecuaciones exponenciales y logarítmicas. Se analizan ejemplos que admiten solución exacta y también ejemplos en los que se pueden obtener aproximaciones numéricas de la solución.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve exponential and logarithmic equations and systems of equations. It analyses examples which admit an exact solution and examples in which the solution can be approximated numerically.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">numérico</string>
            <string language="en">numeric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponencial</string>
            <string language="en">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistema</string>
            <string language="en">system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">solución</string>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">logarítmica</string>
            <string language="en">logarithmic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die exponentialen und logarithmischen Gleichungen und 
die Systeme von Gleichungen zu lösen. Sie analysiert Beispiele,
die eine genaue Lösung und Beispiele zulassen, in denen die Lösung 
numerisch approximiert werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre des équations et des systèmes exponentiels 
et logarithmiques des équations. Elle analyse les exemples qui 
admettent une solution exacte et les exemples dans lesquels la 
solution peut être rapprochée numériquement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
equações e sistemas exponenciais e logarítmicos das equações. 
Analisa os exemplos que admitem uma solução exata e os 
exemplos em que a solução pode ser aproximada numericamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere le equazioni ed i sistemi esponenziali e logaritmici delle 
equazioni. Analizza gli esempi che ammettono una soluzione 
esatta e gli esempi in cui la soluzione può approssimarsi a 
numericamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τις εκθετικά και λογαριθμικά εξισώσεις και τα 
συστήματα των εξισώσεων. Αναλύει τα παραδείγματα που 
αναγνωρίζουν μια ακριβή λύση και τα παραδείγματα στις οποίες η 
λύση μπορεί να προσεγγιστεί αριθμητικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">numerisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">exponential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
